name: Ember.ActionHandler
description:
The Ember.ActionHandler mixin implements support for moving an actions property to an _actions property at extend time, and adding _actions to the object's mergedProperties list.

Ember.ActionHandler is available on some familiar classes including Ember.Route, Ember.View, Ember.Component, and controllers such as Ember.Controller and Ember.ObjectController. (Internally the mixin is used by Ember.CoreView, Ember.ControllerMixin, and Ember.Route and available to the above classes through inheritance.)
